QuestData.Title: Academic Acquaintances
QuestData.Description:
Aye, this Winterpelt variation on furbolg is provin' to be a tough nut to crack even for me.
I've got some colleagues down in Camp Nowhere who might be able to help. I hear there are other furbolg tribes in the area, and comparin' notes on those dialects might give us somethin' to go off of.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find another expert in furbolg languages in Camp Nowhere.
